title: Create static HTML + JS page with basic login form
body:
This subtask belongs to:
- Phase 1: Data Collection & Initial Setup
- Task: Setup basic HTML local storage interface

Objective:
- A simple HTML form with camera capture placeholder
- Basic styling and responsive design
- Placeholder for webcam integration

title: Add placeholder image capture for webcam
body:
This subtask belongs to:
- Phase 1: Data Collection & Initial Setup
- Task: Setup basic HTML local storage interface

Objective:
- Implement basic webcam access
- Add image capture functionality
- Display captured image preview

title: Collect sample facial data
body:
This subtask belongs to:
- Phase 2: Model Development
- Task: Train Face ID Model

Objective:
- Gather diverse facial images for training dataset
- Ensure data quality and diversity
- Organize data for training pipeline
